document.full_text: toyota motor corp  and honda motor corp  took fresh steps to scale back output or reduce orders of some parts in north america as supplies remain disrupted after the march 11 japan earthquake.
document.title: japan carmakers take steps in north america to fight disruption
lines_and_colors: toyota motor corp  and honda motor corp  took fresh steps to scale back output or reduce orders of some parts in north america as supplies remain disrupted after the march 11 japan earthquake.
